law.text:
Fees shall be collected and determined by the board for the following:
Initial license fee (nonrefundable):
Registered occupational therapist, not to exceed fifty dollars ($50);
Certified occupational therapy assistant, not to exceed thirty-five dollars ($35); and
Certification for use of deep physical agent modalities, not to exceed twenty-five dollars ($25);
Renewal of license fees, not to exceed fifty dollars ($50); and
Late renewal fees, not to exceed seventy-five dollars ($75).
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1986.
